info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 4:03PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Union County through 430 PM EDT... At 403 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles northeast of Monroe, or 4 miles north of Wingate, moving west at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Monroe, Unionville, Wingate, Marshville, Lake Park, Hemby Bridge, Fairview In Union County, Mineral Springs, Wesley Chapel and Indian Trail. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
